## Install

### Local instal:
```
npm install brain-even

make run G=<game-name>
```

### Global instal:
```
sudo npm install -g brain-even

<game-name>
```
### Names of games:
```
brain-even
brain-calc
brain-gcd
brain-balance
brain-progression
```
